description:
A faithful dog tries to save his master and fails.  A good doctor spreads medicine even after being betrayed.  A boy challenges demons to win back the medicine he needs for his sick mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sadaroku and Shiro / The Man Who Healed the Dragon`s Eye / The Talisman Bead of the Oni
Sadaroku to Shiro / Ryuu no Me o Naoshita Otoko / Oni no Omamoridama
さだ六としろ / 竜の目をなおした男 / おにのおまもり玉
